gt_lyric: [intro-short] ; [verse] City lights are breathing slow. I walk the avenue alone. Your name is rising with the dawn. I hear it in the humming phones. ; [chorus] Stay with me tonight. We are sparks across the sky. Hold my hand and make it right. We will run until we fly. ; [inst-short] ; [verse] Coffee cups and yellow rain. We laugh beneath the passing trains. Every step becomes a sign. Every heartbeat keeps the time. ; [chorus] Stay with me tonight. We are sparks across the sky. Hold my hand and make it right. We will run until we fly. ; [outro-short]
descriptions: female, warm, pop, bright, acoustic guitar and drums.

gt_lyric: [intro-short] ; [verse] Midnight on the block. I count the cracks in the concrete. Heavy bass in my chest. Every echo got a heartbeat. I paint my path with words. I never fold when the pressure rise. I chase the grind for my family. Only truth in my reply. ; [chorus] From the low to the top. I keep the fire on. No sleep no stop. I keep the mic on. Hands in the air we ride. City lights stay on. I move with the tide. This is my fight song. ; [inst-short] ; [verse] Neon signs and sirens fade. I still hear the voices call. I turn pain into a page. I build a bridge from every fall. I keep the rhythm with the drums. I keep the hunger on my tongue. I stand tall with my crew. We never run from what we begun. ; [chorus] From the low to the top. I keep the fire on. No sleep no stop. I keep the mic on. Hands in the air we ride. City lights stay on. I move with the tide. This is my fight song. ; [outro-short]
descriptions: male, dark, hip hop, gritty, punchy drums and bass.
